idea:
Shoreline Engineers and Contractors India Private limited (SECI) will construct affordable steel fishing vessel with all latest technology which will increase Quantity and Quality of Fish Catch.


fishing boat powered by parallel Hybrid System, 12 meters long and 3.5 meters wide, can carry 6 ton of catch fish and it will be the first of kind fishing boat in India .The idea of the End User was to give fisherman a new way of fishing, putting together comfort and environment protection.


While traditional diesel propulsion, where a diesel engine directly drives the vessel’s propellers, has served the fishing industry well for decades, this method of propulsion has inherent shortcomings that, in today’s highly competitive and environmentally conscious world, are becoming harder and harder for boat owners to live with.


The biggest problem is that diesel engines operate efficiently only over a narrow range of speeds. Outside this speed range, fuel economy is poor and exhaust emissions increase. With direct-drive propulsion, the speed of the diesel engine must at all times match the speed of the vessel. This means that when, for example, the vessel is moving slowly – as is invariably the case in harbors and ports – the engine is constrained to run inefficiently.

The Boat is able to navigate silently in electric mode and if needed or permitted, in Diesel mode. It’s a true redundant propulsion System, which is good for safety. having two parallel power sources, it gives twice as long as the range it was with the Diesel or the electric motor only. When it’s sailing in Diesel mode, the battery can be recharged, thus extending the range in electric mode cruising.

This success allows us to look positively to the future, regarding the development of innovative propulsion systems and the requirements of fishing market, which is increasingly conscious about environmental friendly and comfortable solutions.
name: SHORELINE ENGINEERS AND CONTRACTORS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Mauka is an EdTech platform that aims to impart employability skills to students in colleges, skill training institutes, and ITIs. We want to impart these skills through imbibing curiosity in the students through various activities designed to allow critical thinking to thrive and find answers on their own. We want to tie up with colleges and integrate this into their curriculum. Post the course completion, we want to provide them with access to an exclusive job portal where they can find jobs from companies that have tied up with us.
name: TENTHIRTY TECHNOLOGIES LLP

idea: kitabi-keeda is an edtech helper software application which will employ current content from textbooks and other links to consolidate in one big library, which will serve as an encyclopedia to teachers and students alike. It will enable audio, typed-text interactions and facilitate material navigation in an efficient way.
name: kitabi-keeda

idea: Our aim is to carry on the business of establishing paid sanitation facilities including but not limited to toilets, restrooms, washrooms, bathrooms and to undertake allied activities. The vision is to make the brand 'FreshnUp' synonymous to clean and luxurious washrooms across the highways of the country in the first three years, which will allow young India to travel worry-free. Post that FreshnUp Retail Private Limited will further expand to Tourist places and within the cities of India. Pursuant to the scarcity of clean public toilets along the national highways, we want to fill this lacuna of an important requirement.
name: FRESHNUP RETAIL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Space Aura is a space sports venture. Space Athletes will traverse beyond the Earth and dive from the upper stratosphere wearing custom spacesuits.  

A unique product architecture that will include innovative spacesuit, unique sport product, high-performance scientific balloon, state-of-the-art life support system, ingenious space capsule, and much more. Safety system for the Space diver is our top priority.  

With the best of the tech team having immense experience and capabilities.

Five years ago, we did small-scale launches which eventually led us to human space mission. 


We believe this is the beginning of an exciting journey to accelerate humanity's future towards space with beyond Earth sports, and as a next frontier in sports & space commercialization. The future is here. 


Website
name: SPACE AURA AEROSPACE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
